items.title: AI talent comes at a 30% salary premium: ‘If you try to play catch up later, this is going to cost you even more’
items.description: No longer are AI skills only associated with tech or IT roles.

items.title: Exclusive: Fintech giant Stripe building ‘Tempo’ blockchain with crypto VC Paradigm
items.description: Stripe’s newest push into crypto comes as the company has made an aggressive push into stablecoins.

items.title: Trump extends China tariff truce by another 90 days, pushing new deadline to November
items.description: For now, the extension of a truce means that US tariffs on Chinese goods this year stand at 30%.

items.title: Are U.S. stock markets ‘whistling past the graveyard’? Stifel takes a close look at the great American ‘money illusion’
items.description: With the American consumer running out of breath amid an economic slowdown in the second half of 2025, Stifel sees a selloff of 10% or more in the S&P...

items.title: When the next recession hits, whoever is president will face intense pressure to cut tariffs, so don’t rely on them for revenue, top economist says
items.description: “There’s going to be a strong incentive on that president’s part to say, ‘Okay, I’m going to cut the taxes.’”
